# model

```go
import "github.com/musaubrian/tinygo/model"
```

## type [Site](<https://github.com/musaubrian/tinygo/blob/main/model/model.go#L17-L22>)

Site defines the structure of the db

```go
type Site struct {
    ID       uint64
    Name     string
    UserName string
    Password string
}
```
